subSubSection.paragraph:
Redescription . MALE ( holotype ,
Figs. 3
, 5 C–E, 6, 20 ). Body, including gnathosoma and opisthosomal lobes, 400 ( 390–420 in 4 paratypes ) long and 260 ( 250–260 ) wide.
Idiosoma
. Propodonotal shield about 100 long and 80 wide. Hysteronotal shield about 200 long, 80 wide at level of setae
d 1
and 120 wide at level of setae
f 2
bases. Minimal distance between shields about 40 . Dorsal striae fine. Posterior pair of genital papillae located distinctly outside anterior pair. Aedeagus 35–40 long; sheath of aedeagus present, subequal to aedeagus in length. Diameter of adanal suckers about 20 . Adanal shields fused or narrowly separated anteriorly, about 90 long. Terminal cleft about 30 long. Opisthosomal lobes 35–40 wide at base. Apical membrane of opisthosomal lobes absent. Maximum distance between lobes about 40 . Lengths of setae: si 40–45 , se 130–145 ,
c 2
120–130 , cp 270–280 ,

FEMALE ( 4 paratypes ,
Figs. 4
, 5 A, B, 20 ). Body, including gnathosoma, 380–390 long and 200–220 wide.
Idiosoma
. Propodonotal shield about 100 long and 80 wide. Hysteronotal shield absent. Dorsal striae fine. Epigynum about 80 long. Bursa copulatrix globular. Lengths of setae: si 20–25 , se 140–180 ,

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 5 .
Onychalges pachyspathus Gaud, 1968
, SEM photos. Female (A, B): A—dorsal view; B—prodorsum; male (C–F): C—dorsal view; D—opisthosoma in ventral view; E—aedeagus; F—apical part of tarsus IV in ventral view.

FIGURE 6 .
Onychalges pachyspathus Gaud, 1968
, SEM photos of male. A—gnathosoma in ventral view; B –apical part of tarsus I in dorsal view; C—tarsus II in lateral view; D—tarsus III in lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material examined
. Holotype male ( MRAC 188.256 ),
4 male
,
4 female
and 1 tritonymph paratypes ( MRAC 188.256-188.257 ) from
Estrilda melpoda (Vieillot)
( Passeriformes : Estrildidae ),
CAMEROON
: Centre region, Yaounde,
3 ° 52 'N
,
11 ° 31 'E
,
November 1955
, coll. J. Mouchet.

Non-type material examined .
18 males
,
6 females
, and 1 tritonymph ( MRAC 188.258-188.259 ) from
Estrilda melpoda
,
CAMEROON
: Centre region, Yaounde,
3 ° 52 'N
,
11 ° 31 'E
,
November 1956
, coll. J. Gaud;
2 males
and
2 females
( MRAC 188.261 ) from
Estrilda nonnula Hartlaub
,
CAMEROON
: Centre region, Yaounde,
3 ° 52 'N
,
11 ° 31 'E
,
November 1955
, coll. J. Gaud;
1 male
( MRAC 188.260 ) from

,
CAMEROON
: Centre region, Yaounde,

,

,
November 1955
, coll. J. Mouchet;

( MRAC 188.262 ) from

,

, coll. J. Gaud;

,

( UMMZ BMOC 10 -0503-003)

,
MALAWI
